purpose: Facilitates the deployment and management of AI agent services on personal or cloud infrastructure
principle: Leverages containerization and shell scripting for deployment and management of AI services
reusability: Designed for plug-and-play deployment with configurable settings for various AI services
limitations: Primarily supports shell scripting environments; may require additional configuration for non-standard setups
name: gaianet-node
description: Install and run your own AI agent service
highlight: Enables users to host and operate their own AI agent services with ease
